description: Uses soundings to generate multiple code solutions and pick the best one

inputs_schema.problem: Description of the coding problem to solve

cells.name: generate_solution
cells.instructions:
Solve this coding problem: {{ input.problem }}

Provide a complete Python solution with explanation.

candidates.evaluator_instructions: You are an expert software engineer. Evaluate the following code solutions based on: 1) Correctness - does it solve the problem? 2) Efficiency - what is the time/space complexity? 3) Code quality - is it readable and well-structured? 4) Edge cases - does it handle corner cases? Select the BEST solution overall.

cells.name: test_solution
cells.instructions:
Review the chosen solution and write test cases for it. Use the 'run_code' tool to verify it works correctly.

Once the code executes successfully with output, you're done. Don't continue explaining - the validator will check for success.

rules.retry_instructions:
⚠️ Code validation failed: {{ validation_error }}

Please provide more complete code. Attempt {{ attempt }}/{{ max_attempts }}
